title: Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahani Might Get A Sequel
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! The craze of Karan Johar’s recent film Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani has spread like wildfire, and there is no stopping it. The star cast was a highlight for many who enjoyed the film. APart from this, the songs have also been super hit among fans and the catchy beats are trending all over the internet. The film has seen success in a very short span and does not look like it is going to stop any time soon. It has already raked in 100 Crores at the box office. But did you know that there have been talks about a sequel? In a recent interview with Film Companion, Karan Johar revealed that there have been discussions about a potential sequel of this blockbuster, starring the lead actors Alia and Ranveer. He also said that all three of them believe that the characters of Rocky and Rani deserve a spin-off of their own. Though there are active discussions taking place, nothing is concrete as of now and the concept is still in its early stages. This is great news for all the Rocky and Rani fans, me being one of them! Take a peek into their world with this trailer if you haven’t watched the film yet. It would be exciting to see this project come to life as each of them have such strong personalities, that one film is just isn’t enough to capture all of it.

title: Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani OTT Release May Have All Deleted Scenes
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani has gained immense appreciation and has been one of the top releases so far. Karan Johar has returned at full speed and has not disappointed us at all! The plot, the cast, the music, everything was so beautifully put giving us the old Bollywood back. During a press conference recently, it was revealed that there are deleted scenes that were a part of the film and weren’t included for this reason. A post shared by Ranveer Singh (@ranveersingh) Ranveer Singh revealed during the press conference that he wishes a few deleted scenes would be included in the OTT release. The actor reveals that Originally, the film had a runtime of 3 hours and 10 minutes. However, director Karan Johar and his team decided to trim around 22 minutes from the film due to its excessive duration. Among the scenes removed were one where Rocky expresses, “Love hai to sab hai” to Rani, the end credits song ‘Kudmayi’ and a few other comical sequences. During this press meet, Ranveer made a special request to the director. He asked if the deleted scenes, including Rani’s theme song, could be included in the OTT version of the movie. Ranveer mentioned that fans were eager to see these additional moments. Karan Johar smiled and replied that they would consider it. A post shared by Ranveer Singh (@ranveersingh) This film has been an absolute delight to watch. In the press conference, the cast members revealed many interesting facts about the movie and even spoke about the BTS. I love seeing such interaction and waiting to know more about the film and their journey! Also Read: Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani Sequel

title: Manav Chabbra Drops His First Solo Rap, R.O.T.Y Which Is All About His Journey - MissMalini
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Content could be in the form of food, dance , music, poetry, etc and we’re all eyes for it. We love the fact that content creators are exploring newer forms of content to increase their experience and surprise their audience both at the same time. Speaking of exploring, the very famous content creator, Manav Chabbra a.k.a. MNV is setting the bar higher each day with his amazing self. Be it singing, acting, dancing, or even rapping he is truly the king of all trades and our hearts. Very recently, he dropped his first solo rap named R.O.T.Y ( Rookie Of The Year) on his second YouTube channel, MNV TV and we couldn’t believe our eyes, it was just too damn good! Find out more about his song right below. He raps about his twist and turned-filled journey to stardom in the rawest and unfiltered way with loads of emotions attached to it. What makes this song even more unique and personalized to him is that he was the composer, singer and lyricist of this rap. For a fact he wrote, recorded and shot this within a span of 24 hours and the outcome in such a short duration is just WOW ! He was challenged to create something in a day’s time and he accepted the challenge in the most Manav Chabbra style, wouldn’t you agree too? This single is very special to me for a lot of reasons. It’s a gift to all my fans that have been with me through thick and thin, it was also quite an adventure to craft the whole piece in just one day. I’m really excited for people to see this labour of love. Creating content has been something that is very close to my heart. Every content piece I create is a part of myself that I put out there and this rap song is one such crucial piece that I’ve shared with my audience. The feeling of creating my first solo rap song is surreal and unlike anything I’ve done before. I was challenged to create this song in all its entirety in 24 hours! So, though it was a challenging task, I was determined to accomplish it. I’m thankful to the team that helped me put everything together in the limited time we had. Rookie of the Year is a song dedicated to all those people who think they are the underdogs, this song is for you to understand your potential and grow to unimaginable heights! This rap was curated specially to appreciate all my followers. This one was for the FAM ! There’s just one small message I’d like to give them. This song is all about the journey from struggles to success, and I hope it motivates you to do great things, just as your support motivated me to create this. His aim has always been to entertain his audience with the best content possible from vlogs to challenges to songs, all of it. Manav’s charm is getting him super close to 2 million followers on Instagram and we’re super proud of how far he has come. And can’t wait for him to endeavour newer things in life ‘ cause skies not even the limit for him. On that note, follow @missmalinitrending to get more information about your fave influencers, trends and creators. Stay safe!

title: Alia Bhatt Says THIS About Ranbir Kapoor, Sanjay Leela Bhansali Collaborating Again - MissMalini
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Sanjay Leela Bhansali is renowned for his distinctive and elaborate storytelling, creating films that captivate audiences with their grandeur in sets, costumes, and emotional depth. His movies have always stood out, and fans eagerly anticipate each new release. Bhansali’s latest project, ‘Love & War,’ promises to be a cinematic spectacle, especially with the star-studded cast of Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor, and Vicky Kaushal. This film marks a significant reunion between Ranbir Kapoor and Sanjay Leela Bhansali, rekindling the magic of their past collaborations. A post shared by Vicky Kaushal (@vickykaushal09) In a recent interview with News 18, Alia Bhatt shared her immense excitement for ‘Love & War’, particularly at the prospect of witnessing Ranbir Kapoor and Sanjay Leela Bhansali ’s reunion. She expressed her awe, noting how thrilled she is to see their dynamic on screen again. Alia also highlighted the special synergy between Vicky Kaushal and Ranbir Kapoor, recalling their magical collaboration in ‘Sanju,’ and her own memorable experience working with Vicky in ‘Raazi.’ She stressed the importance of maintaining focus and hard work, emphasizing that while the excitement around the film is palpable, the most crucial aspect is delivering top-notch performances. “At the end of the day, it’s about keeping your head down and working hard,” she said. “The real excitement is in the film’s material, and when you’re on set, you have to give your absolute best, putting in 180 percent effort.” I can’t wait to see Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, and Vicky Kaushal share the screen in ‘Love & War.’ The anticipation is thrilling, and I’m so excited to witness their combined magic!

title: Exclusive ! Maniesh Paul ! हमें सीनियर्स एक्टर्स से टाइम मैनेजमेंट सीखने की जरूरत है - MissMalini
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! इस हफ्ते रिलीज हुई है फिल्म जुग जुग जियो और फिल्म को काफी लोगों ने पसंद भी किया है। खासतौर से मनीष पॉल, जो हमेशा लोगों को हंसाने में यकीन करते हैं, उनकी खूब तारीफ़ हो रही है, ऐसे में हाल ही में जब मेरी मनीष से बातचीत हुई, तो उन्होंने बताया कि बचपन से ही कैसे वह फिल्मों में दिलचस्पी लेने लगे थे और इसके अलावा और भी कई बातें की, मैं उस बातचीत के अंश यहाँ शेयर कर रही हूँ। मनीष कहते हैं कि उन्हें शुरू से ही फिल्में देखने का शौक बहुत रहा है। वह विस्तार से बताते हैं मैं फिल्मों का इतना बड़ा कीड़ा था कि बता नहीं सकता। अमिताभ बच्चन की फिल्में देखने के बाद, तो सीने पर मर्द का टैग लगा कर घूमता था। जब भी मेरे स्कूल में फैंसी ड्रेस कंपीटिशन होता था, मैं अमिताभ बच्चन का ही किरदार निभाता था। मुझे याद है जब मैं अमिताभ सर से मिला था, तो उनसे 786 के उस बिल्ले पर साइन भी करवाया था, यह सबकुछ मेरे लिए फिल्मों में आने की तैयारी जैसा ही था। मनीष ब ताते हैं कि उनके घर में पढ़ने-लिखने का ही माहौल हुआ करता था। वह बताते हैं सच कहूँ, तो घर में मेरे जैसा फिल्म देखने वाला तो कोई नहीं था। मेरे पापा चार्टेड एकाउंटेड थे। लेकिन मैं कभी भी पढ़ाई में मन नहीं लगा पाता था। मैं घरवालों को कहता था कि मुझे पॉकेट मनी मत दो, मगर मुझे फिल्मों के कैसेट खरीद दो। मैं तो फिल्में देखने के लिए पता नहीं क्या कर जाता था। पुरानी फिल्में, पुराने गाने सब सुनता था. मैं राजकपूर की भी फिल्में देखता था, लेकिन सबसे ज्यादा जिस फिल्म ने मुझे छुआ, वह दीवार और अग्निपथ थी। मैं जब भी स्कूल से घर पर लंच खाने के लिए आता था, मैं वीएचएस पर वही देखता था। मैं चाहता हूँ कि अपने बच्चे के साथ यह सबकुछ शेयर करूँ। मनीष पॉल कहते हैं कि वह अपने सीनियर्स से टाइम मैनेजमेंट सीखना चाहते हैं वह कहते हैं मेरा मानना है कि हमारे जेनरेशन के स्टार्स में ऐसा नहीं है कि वार्मथ नहीं है, बस टाइम मैनेजमेंट की कमी है। इसलिए परेशानी होती है। मेरा मानना है कि बिजी रहते हुए भी हमें एक दूसरे को तवज्जो देनी चाहिए। जैसे अर्जुन कपूर अभी शूट कर रहे थे नैनीताल में, मैं भी शूट कर रहा था, तो हम मिल न पाए हों, लेकिन हर दिन हम बात जरूर करते थे। मैं गौर करता हूँ कि अनिल सर को मैं फोन करूँ और उनका कॉल मिस हो जाये, तब भी वह मुझे फोन करते हैं। यह सबकुछ हमें उन लोगों से सीखने की जरूरत है। दरअसल , मनीष का ही ये चार्म है मुझे ऐसा लगता है, जिसके वजह से वह हर स्टार्स के फेवरेट हैं। वह यूं ही चार्म बिखेरते रहें, पॉजिटिविटी देते रहें, मैं तो यही चाहूंगी और उनसे हमेशा पॉजिटिव एनर्जी ही लेना चाहूंगी .

title: Bigg Boss 16 11th February Day 132 Highlights
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! At this point, I would say that the Grand Finale of Bigg Boss 16 is already here and the contestants were in for a treat filled full of twists and turns, with the contestants giving it their all in the face of danger as Rohit Shetty himself comes in the house to select the first contestant of his reality show, “Khatron Ke Khiladi”. But as we know that the fights never stop, Priyanka Chahar Choudhary , went head to head with Shalin Bhanot , with the two of them exchanging heated words. Priyanka accused Shalin of using other female contestants like Tina Datta and Soundarya Sharma to advance in the show, while Shalin countered that Priyanka only wanted “footage” and created the fight for that reason! But, I didn’t mind this fight considering it might be the last fight of the season. Enter the master of stunts himself, Rohit Shetty, who announced that he had come to select the finalist for “Khatron Ke Khiladi 13”. The contestants took turns naming the toughest competitor, with Archana Gautam being picked for her innocent charm by MC Stan , Priyanka naming Shiv Thakare for his strength and vice versa. Archana chooses Shiv, while Shalin selected Priyanka. The first stunt was the “Fear of the Unknown”, with contestants facing black boxes containing unknown objects. Archana started and was scared when she pulled out a vegetable, but in the next box, she felt a bite and backed off. MC Stan also felt a sting, but he gave up. The prankster? A volunteer with a cucumber! A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) The real stunt was an underwater challenge, where contestants had to unlock screws and reach the finish line. MC Stan breezed through the first lock but ran out of breath. Archana struggled but successfully unlocked herself. Shiv triumphed, while Shalin went shirtless and completed the task effortlessly, leaving everyone in awe. Priyanka, however, struggled and gave up. It was time for some fun after the intense task, and Rohit assigned MC Stan to be Archana’s father and Shalin as the suitor. Impersonating his funny voice, he dished out hilarious one-liners and even jokingly roasted Shalin’s love for chicken. Bringing in his rap skills, he skewered both with his “Toqueer Sahab” voice, leaving everyone in stitches. MC Stan’s new avatar is loveable than ever. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) The game took a hilarious turn with a twist on dum charades, where every wrong guess resulted in a shock from the bands on their hands. Shalin and Priyanka started, and after some shocks, finally guessed Archana’s famous phrase. Archana and Shiv went next, and Archana’s epic reactions to “captaincy” were a sight to behold. In the next round, Archana and Shiv navigated through lasers while blindfolded, with Archana facing plenty of shocks, but with Shiv’s hilarious guidance, they made it to the end. Priyanka and Shalin followed, overcoming shocks and completing the task, emerging as the winners. The final challenge was a race to victory, riding a cycle and collecting cards, all to break a towering glass with a single blow. Priyanka took off with ease, her nimble fingers quickly grabbing the cards. Shalin followed with a flourish, his performance so smooth that everyone was left in awe. But when Shalin was called to the house, he refused, revealing that he had a fear that kept him from continuing the show. Archana protested, saying it wasn’t fair to Shiv who lost his chance because of Shalin. But, I must say that Shalin played very well and certainly deserves to be in “KKK13”. The contestants gave it their all, and it was a nail-biting finish that left everyone on the edge of their seats. The making of grand finale was also shown which made me all excited and has now left me eagerly waiting for d-day. Get ready for more updates and gossip, and don’t forget to grab your popcorn!

title: From Alia Bhatt’s Met Gala Saree To Makeup And Hairstyle, This GRWM Video Is Taking Over The Internet - MissMalini
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Alia Bhatt captivated everyone at the Met Gala 2024 with her breathtaking floral saree ensemble. Her mesmerizing appearance has been causing a sensation, earning her widespread admiration. The ‘Get Ready with Me’ video showcasing her makeup, hair, and saree styling has been rapidly gaining popularity, further solidifying her status as a style icon. In the Vogue video, Alia Bhatt is accompanied by Sabyasachi Mukherjee, Anaita Shroff, Amit Thakur, and Puneet Saini, who assisted her in getting ready. Alia begins by expressing her admiration for the timeless elegance of the saree. Stylist Anaita Shroff shares insights into the extensive research conducted and Sabyasachi’s contributions, including the addition of beautiful fringing and assembling the look. Alia discusses her makeup, mentioning how she and makeup artist Puneet Saini aimed for a surreal appearance, enhancing her freckles and opting for a rose-like lip color to complement the outdoor theme. Hair stylist Amit Thakur explains their intention to align with the Met Gala’s ‘Garden of Time’ theme by creating an ethereal yet modern look with undone hair. Alia emphasizes the importance of feeling good to look good and expresses her confidence in choosing Sabyasachi for the occasion. She fondly recalls wearing a saree for the first time in ninth grade. The video highlights the collaborative effort involved in draping the saree and the meticulous attention to detail by the entire team. Anaita adds a fascinating insight about how the Met Gala exhibit was divided into three distinct parts: land, sea, and sky. She describes how the land section showcased flowers and butterflies, creating a picturesque setting. This division provides context to Alia’s ensemble, emphasizing its connection to the natural elements and the overall theme of the event. Alia’s stunning appearance at the Met Gala perfectly reflects her timeless elegance and effortless charm. Hearing the intricate process behind her look and watching the behind-the-scenes video provides a deeper appreciation for the meticulous teamwork and attention to detail involved.

title: Bigg Boss 16 Grand Finale Live Written Updates
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! The moment of truth has finally arrived! India’s beloved reality show, Bigg Boss 16 , is ready to crown its winner and the entire nation is holding its breath in anticipation. After four months of drama, excitement, and unexpected twists and turns, the top five finalists stand ready to claim the title. Priyanka Chahar Choudhary , Shalin Bhanot , Archana Gautam , Shiv Thakare , and MC Stan have all taken unique paths to reach this point, but they all share one thing in common – they’ve created memories that will last a lifetime. Stay tuned as we find out who will become the next winner of Bigg Boss 16 as this spectacular evening is going to be full of excitement keeping you hooked to your couch. Read the live updates here! MC Stan becomes the winner and Shiv is the first runner-up! The mandali is in power always. Priyanka Chahar Choudhary gets out in the race of the finale which makes MC Stan and Shiv Thakare the top two. Priyanka and Shiv put a performance in their competitive nature and crazy fights. It was the dance of water and fire and it was one of the best performances I must say! A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) MC Stan’s fiance bubba gets to do a phone call with MC Stan where she expresses she is angry because he keeps complimenting Priyanka’s face cut and jawline. Abdu sings a song based on his journey and it’s nothing less than amazing. Priyanka and Ankit’s friendship is highlighted in her performance followed by her uprising as a strong contender after Ankit leaves the house. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) Karan Kundra, Reem Shaikh and Gashmeer Mahajani come on stage to promote their new show which will be telecasted in place of Bigg Boss 16 from tomorrow. Krushna Abhishek comes on the stage in his Dharam Paaji avatar and comes back with his comic element. Sunny brings in a task where the four finalists have to pull out a pump under which the destiny is written of whose safe and whose not. Shiv, Priyanka and MC Stan are going ahead in the race and Archana is out of the race and Archana is in tears. Sunny Deol and Ameesha Patel come onto the stage to promote their new film “Gadar 2” which is releasing this coming August. Abdu comes in as mini “Tara” and gifts a small Taj Mahal monument to “Sakina (Ameesha)”. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) The mandali moments are relived as Shiv, Nimrit, Sajid, Abdu, MC Stan and Sumbul perform an amazing dance story of their memories. The whole mandali wore a super cool jacket with “Haq se mandali” written on it. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) Salman Khan releases the first look of the song from his upcoming movie “Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan” on the Bigg Boss 16 stage. He also states that it will release on Valentine’s day. Shalin joins Salman on stage where Salman uplifts his spirits, reminding him that better opportunities await and his efforts have not gone unnoticed. Salman announces that Ekta Kapoor is launching a new show and wants Shalin to play the lead role. To celebrate this exciting news, Salman presents Shalin with a mini trophy buzzer. Shalin’s performance highlights his two favourite things one is chicken and the other is Tina. Also, not forgetting other elements like the buzzer and being a “Acha Admi”. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) Bigg Boss announces that one of the finalists would have to leave the house and it would be mutually decided on who will be leaving. But, the prize money is at stake! Bigg Boss already has the results, if the finalists guess wrong on who deserves to leave the house then the prize money would be deducted. The four finalists go up against Shalin and state that he deserves to leave for different reasons. Salman declares that Shalin Bhanot is out of the race. He wishes everyone luck and even kisses Maahim goodbye! A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) Salman Khan plays a video which shows that shows Archana Gautam’s supporters from her area have given her all the love and made her the finalist. Archana shines with her lively dance performance, from her passion for tea to her comedic rants about being single. Her signature catchphrase, “mar mar ke mor bana dungi,” steals the show. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) Salman starts by teasing Shalin with Tina’s name and the coldness is still there as Tina says that she doesn’t recognize him. Bhai doesn’t fail Ankit to tease Priyanka’s name and also jokes with Sajid stating that if he becomes a politician he will have to marry Archana. As MC Stan imitates Sumbul’s father, he enters the stage and Stan’s reaction is hilarious. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) All the contestants except for the top five finalists are present on the stage singing the Bigg Boss anthem as Salman makes his swag entry. Tina Datta has also now joined the other contestants on the stage. The top five finalists are waiting in the house as Bigg Boss surprises them by sending their beloved mothers of the top five finalists to wish them luck. The fathers are already sitting on stage with the other contestants. Krushna is in Dharam ji’s character and full-on roasts the contestants tickling everyone’s funny bones with his funny comments and interaction with the contestants. A journey video is played where the highlights of the show are played whether it be crying or laughing together the contestants have done it all. Salman narrates this video summarizing the whole journey of all 16 contestants. Bharati and Krushna bring laughter with their comedic portrayal of Shalin’s love story and the triangle between Tina and Sumbul. Another segment starts as friends have to admire each other. Sajid leads with admiration for Shiv, crediting his hard work for deserving the trophy. Shiv, humbled, reciprocates with gratitude for Sajid’s constant support. Next up, Archana and Soundarya take the stage, while Ankit and Priyanka effortlessly pair up. In the next game, a timer is put up for 5 seconds and they have to answer Bharati and Krushna’s questions. The finalists are asked to freeze and Sajid Khan , Abdu Rozik , Sumbul Toqueer and Nimrit Kaur Ahluwalia enter the house. Followed by Soundarya Sharma , Ankit Gupta , Sreejita De , Gautam Vig , Gori Nagori , Manya Singh , and Vikkas Manaktala all the previous contestants enter the house except for Tina Datta . A rap battle between the mandali and non-mandali members makes the ambience in the house crazy. The competition of both teams continues with a musical chair game. Abdu dances with Soundarya, Priyanka and Nimrit and flirts with them. Trust me nothing was cuter than this. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) Krushna Abhishek enters the Bigg Boss 16 house and the five finalists look more than glamorous. Bharati Singh joins and the duo bring in the comic element roasting the contestants on their journey and reliving their memories.

title: Bigg Boss 16 Grand Finale Winner Announced: Rapper MC Stan Takes the Title
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! After a journey of more than four months in the Bigg Boss 16 house, curtains have been dropped and Salman Khan has finally declared the most-awaited winner of the season and its none other than Bigg Boss 16’s “Basti Ka Hasti” MC Stan . The first runner-up is Marathi Bigg Boss winner Shiv Thakare followed by the second runner up who is the highly opinionated Priyanka Chahar Choudhary and honestly, it actually left me shocked when she got out of the race. From the top five finalists, Shalin Bhanot goes out of the finale race first due to the lack of votes, followed by Archana Gautam who was nothing but entertaining this season. Coming to the winner’s journey, MC Stan has had an amazing one with lots of ups and downs. From entering and getting nominated time and again over not being involved to finding a family and safe space in his very own “Mandali”, MC Stan has always maintained a very strong presence. Whether it be giving savage comebacks or saying “Shembdi” in his “P-Town” language it has made him win hearts. From feeling lonely and wanting to quit the show to bagging the Bigg Boss 16 Winner Trophy, MC Stan has yet again gained success being the self-made man that he is. From a huge fight with Shiv Thakare to being best friends with him their friendship has only bloomed with time. The mandali has attained the ultimate power in this game, it’s always been a rare sight to see a friendship like the mandali’s in the Bigg Boss 16 house. From his love-hate friendship with Priyanka to pulling Abdu Rozik ‘s leg, he has been raw and real throughout the season. This has no doubt made him take the trophy with all pride and is nothing less than deserving. The way he has opened up himself during the last few weeks was just astonishing. Just like MC Stan proudly displays his jewellery and shoes now he can proudly showcase the trophy. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) Now with the Bigg Boss 16 done, I am wondering what’s next for our winner and one thing I know for a fact is that he is going to shoot out his rap songs like a bullet from a gun. Apart from all this, I am more excited to get the news of his and Bubba’s marriage next! A hearty congratulations to MC Stan and I can’t wait to hear his upcoming songs!

title: Exclusive! Bigg Boss 16: Tina Datta Makes 5 Interesting Revelations About Her Journey - MissMalini
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Don’t we all have a million questions for all the contestants of Bigg Boss 16 ? Well, some of them may just have been answered for you. MissMalini got candid in her latest interview with Tina Datta , who has surely won a lot of hearts with the zeal that she played the game. She makes some interesting revelations about her Bigg Boss journey, read on to find out! Here are 5 revelations Tina Datta made in this interview… 1. She revealed how the first few days were slow inside the house. Since you do not know how you are supposed to spend your 24 hours, and how much you are supposed to talk to people. And also how difficult it is to pass time, especially when you do not have sunlight coming in you do know what your meal time should be. 2. She also states how she never wanted to be a part of Bigg Boss. Her reason for that is that it is not easy to spend three months inside the house without your friends and family. She also tells us that it was her closest friends who told her that you are a survivor, and you can do it. 3. When Malini asked her whether she watches Bigg Boss now that she is out of the house, revealed that she does not watch it and how she has put an end to that chapter of her life once the finale was done. 4. She also revealed that it was Shalin Bhanot’s aggressiveness that put her off, and accepts that she regrets saying ‘Oh I’m going to fall in love with you’ to Shalin, inside the house. And later on, decided to draw a boundary and not be friends with him. 5. In the Rapid Fire game towards the end of the episode, Malini asks the one thing that she does not like about Bigg Boss, to which she responds that she does not like how the narratives are twisted inside the house. There’s a lot more in store for you, check out the video below to find out…

title: Exclusive! Rupali Ganguly: ‘My Current Most Important Inspirational Woman In My Life Is Anupamaa!’ - MissMalini
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Rupali Ganguly has always won hearts with her characters. May it be Monisha from Sarabhai vs Sarabhai in the past, or as Anupamaa. She is now a household name, that everyone seems to love, me being one of them! Her character Anupamaa has been an inspiration to many women, to stand up for themselves and pave a better path in their lives. In an exclusive, Rupali Ganguly spoke to the team of Miss Malini on how her character Anupamaa inspired her and what she has learnt from it. Here’s what she had to say. Her mother and her sister were two women who inspired her the most, but apart from that, Anupamaa’s character has been the most inspirational woman in her life. She added, While my mom and her sister and all the women I have grown up with over the years have always been a big inspiration to my life, my current most important inspirational woman in my life is Anupamaa! I want to thank this beautiful woman for teaching me the importance of self love, which is above all! She taught me that loving your family is definitely priority, but to not forget ourselves too! Her character taught her, that as a mother and a wife, your priority should not just be your family, but also yourself. And how loving yourself, is equally important as loving your family. And in doing so, does not make you a smaller person. She also added, If you feed yourself with love,only then will you be able to give that love to others. Rupali Ganguly from the sets of Anupamaa A post shared by Rups (@rupaliganguly) She also said that she is grateful for all the values Anupamaa has inculcated in her, and continues to do so, every working day. She also mentioned that the beauty of Anupamaa is that she transitions with time and situations while keeping her core value intact. That honestly, is a great skill to pick up. We all have a thing or two, to learn from her.

title: Exclusive! Shalin Bhanot: ‘Life Has Completely Changed Post Bigg Boss, I Am No Longer The Shalin That I Was…’ - MissMalini
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! One of the most talked about contestants on Bigg Boss 16 was Shalin Bhanot . You and I know the reasons for it also, and while I thought that Shalin was a strong contender for the trophy, seeing him out at the fifth position was a little disappointing for me. But Bigg Boss truly became a life-changing experience for Shalin. In fact, it even opened up lots of doors and opportunities for the actor. The biggest and the latest one is the Colors TV show Bekaboo which premieres on 18th March. Other than Shalin the show also stars Eisha Singh , Monalisa , Zain Imam , Shivangi Joshi , Shubhaavi Choksey , Chetan Hansraj , and Arjit Taneja . A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) I am going all bekaboo for Bekaboo, because Colors plus Balaji is coming together, on top of that I am playing a monster. Supernatural really excites me all the time, whether a Superman, Spiderman, or now Ranav. The wittiness and grey jokes that the character has are a little similar to what Shalin has. A post shared by ColorsTV (@colorstv) Life has completely changed post Bigg Boss. I was human inside, but I am no longer human or the Shalin that I was. The very next day I became Ranav the monster. After going to Bigg Boss I realized how important it is to be in touch with your loved ones on a daily basis. There are lots of plans to star in films and web-shows, I am waiting for my dream producers and directors like Karan Johar and Sanjay Leela Bhansali to give me a call or give me a five-minute job in their movies. I would love to do that. A post shared by Shalin Bhanot (@shalinbhanot) I have just started with my journey of playing different roles, playing a role like Ranav was something I couldn’t have even dreamt of. So it is beyond a dream role for me, and there is a list of dream roles. I would love to play a drunkard like Amitabh sir, or a blind guy like Al-Pachino , picture toh abhi baaki hai mere dost . Well, I am sure Shalin that this picture will also be a blockbuster and a very long one with various roles for you to play. On that note, wish you the very best for Bekaboo.

title: Palki Malhotra Exclusive Interview with MissMalini
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! With a remarkable contribution in the world of Television series, Palki Malhotra has seen phenomenal success with shows like ‘ Dill Mill Gayye ‘, ‘Dil Dostii Dance’ under her name. The creative producer, writer, producer and dance director is now creating waves with her latest show, ‘Campus Beats’ starring Shantanu Maheshwari , Shruti Sinha, Sahaj Singh Chahal, and Tanvi Gadkari. In a candid chat with MissMalini, Palki talks about the her latest show, the evolvement in the OTT space and more. ‘Campus Beats’ is your second dance show after ‘Dil Dostii Dance’, why and how do you feel this genre connects with the youth? ‘Campus Beats’ is just not the dance show, both the shows have a campus, the rivalry, the connection, the growing up, the coming of age, and living, exploring, and understanding our own life and others. The years when you are actually finding yourself and the external world around you are what you remember the most and you cherish the most. If somebody asks you about your growth, you will always go back to your school days because at that point in time, passion is a key you give so much importance to. So growing up is the most relatable aspect of anybody’s life. And, that is why ‘Dil Dosti Dance’ has worked and I feel ‘Campus Beats’ will also resonate with the audience because it’s not just the genre but also about exploring ourselves. It’s about understanding the world and what you are capable of in the world around you. And then of course there’s a tadka of dance. Youth shows like these will forever connect with the youth. It’s just that you need to understand the show and you need to make it with that purity. Tell us about the idea behind the concept of ‘Campus Beats’? The idea behind ‘Campus Beats’ was that I wanted to make a youth show for the longest time. In 2013, ‘Dil Dosti Dance’ and I parted ways and from then I always had the idea of creating another youth show. But it just took a very long time, the industry was going through a lot of changes, youth channels shut down, and OTT began to bloom. But, the one thing that remained constant was the hunger for youth shows. And when I noticed, that there were not many youth shows offered to the youth of India. The youth started to tilt towards K-Dramas. For me, K-Dramas was something that I thought was exactly what we used to do during our ‘Star One’ or ‘Channel V’ days because ‘Dill Mil Gayye’ or ‘D3’ were pretty much similar to K-Dramas. So that’s when I was aggressively pitching to get back the youth shows, writing them again, and pitching it with the tadka of a thriller. So I thought, why not do a Campus series that can have a thriller aspect with a teen drama. I really thought it was required and the youth of India was really looking for it, which is a pretty clean, fun, relatable, light-hearted drama and that is the reason we came up with ‘Campus Beats’. In the near future, what is the kind of content you are looking at creating in the OTT space? OTT is a very interesting space, you get to do a lot of things. But having said that, there is a particular pattern that OTT sees like for example, if it’s crime, if there is a show which is popular in crime, then there will be a lot of people making a lot of crime shows. So I personally do not want to follow that pattern. I would want to do something very different and offer something very different on board. I like to break patterns. I am that kind of a person. The other thing is that I personally feel that OTT in India, whatever content we are offering is not very tilted towards youth. So I feel, it is required that India needs to make good youth content, homegrown content, not just you know replicate something or remake something. I feel that the youth of India is tilting towards the western side or not just Western I mean, tilting towards international shows, fiction shows, but it is so cool if we can create our own and we can get that madness for our homegrown products. We used to make great shows. We had fantastic shows where the whole youth of India was crazier I mean, they were crazy about so many shows earlier during the good old days of ‘Star One’ and ‘Channel V’ and ‘MTV’ for that matter. As a content creator and producer, would you say the OTT space is a boon for you? OTT has been a boon to almost everybody in the industry, so what it offers is a bridge between TV and films or I would say it offers a middle ground to people. There were a lot of people who were getting frustrated with it, with the kind of work that was happening on TV. They were also getting frustrated because they were probably not getting work in films. So what OTT has done for everybody is offered a mid path. It’s a fantastic way of bringing a different kind of vision on board.What has also happened is that suddenly you know India has come together to watch other content. With the digital boom, the shows OTT have been releasing in plenty, how important is it for you to ensure that your show stands out and stays with the audience? For any creator it is important for their show to stand out, right? It is extremely important. All I can say is that the moment you stop following a pattern you will stand out. So one of the reasons why we are a ‘Campus Beats’, a teen drama amidst so much mystery and thriller that has been launched or is being launched right now, I feel that ‘Campus Beats’ is going to stand out big time. I try my level best to always be different with the kind of stuff that I’m bringing about. I mean it needs to be different from the herd mentality that is going on right now. Even the marketing needs to be different. I mean that’s extremely important to any show. So if you’re talking about, pumping up, pumping numbers, the numbers will also come with the kind of marketing you’re doing. You also need to put a lot of soul into creating content, but also creating a very different kind of marketing for yourself. What’s in store for Palki? For me, it is something where I need to make a difference. I do not believe in making shows, I believe in creating legacies. So I try my level best with whatever show that I bring about, to create a legacy of its own that people talk about even after a decade. And I’m very proud of my previous shows like ‘Dil Dostii Dance’ and ‘Dill Mill Gayye’ where people still till date talk about it and there’s still demand for Season 2. So I believe that no matter what I do, it is going to be me writing, directing or producing anything that I do because I want to create a legacy.

title: Anupamaa Actor Rupali Ganguly Reveals Her First Paycheck Amount And Opens Up On Financial Struggles - MissMalini
article_content: Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Hi Guest Join India's #1 source for updates! Popular television actress Rupali Ganguly, best known for her role as Anupamaa in the hit show “Anupamaa,” recently shared a heartfelt account of her family’s financial struggles during her formative years. The daughter of renowned filmmaker Anil Ganguly and sister to Bollywood choreographer Vijay Ganguly, Rupali opened up about the challenging times her family faced due to her father’s films not performing well at the box office. In a candid interview with Mashable India, Rupali revealed the adverse impact of consecutive box office failures of her father’s films, particularly mentioning the film “Dushman Devta” led by Dharmendra. A post shared by Rups (@rupaliganguly) Recalling her initial steps into the world of theatre, Rupali highlighted her humble beginnings. Her first play, titled “Atmakatha,” was staged at Prithvi Theatre and produced by Dinesh Thakur. The seasoned actress shared a poignant detail about her first paycheck, earned from her initial foray into theatre. For her debut play “Atmakatha,” Rupali received a modest sum of Rs 50. This meagre amount, while symbolic of her modest beginnings, reflects her resilience and determination to pursue her passion for acting. Rupali Ganguly’s journey in the entertainment industry has been remarkable, overcoming financial setbacks and challenges. Her portrayal of Anupamaa in the eponymous television series has garnered widespread acclaim and love from audiences. Rupali Ganguly’s candid revelation about her family’s financial struggles and her journey from a modest Rs 50 paycheck to becoming a celebrated television actress is truly inspiring. Her resilience, dedication, and passion for acting have shaped her into the acclaimed performer she is today.
